page.title: 06Population and Employment
page.content: The population of Ravensworth is 250. The percentage of people who have jobs is; Men 78.6%, Women 18.5%. Jobs are provided for local people as follows:- Garden Centre - 6 family members, 4fem., 1male and many part-time helpers. Forge - 2 family members, 1 male (mainly agricultural engineering). Public House and Restaurant - 4 family members and 7 part-time staff. School - 3 female teachers, 1 cook and 1 assistant, 2 part-time dinner ladies and 1 female caretaker. Motor Vehicle Repairer - Mr Bulmer, who is self-employed. Village Shop - owner self-employed. Farms - There are 5 farms, all of which employ only family members. Caravan Site - Owners only. Agricultural Machinery Repairer - Mr Gregory who is self-employed.
